original_title: Century of Queen Mother - 100 Years in 100 Minutes: A Celebration
overview: Provides a thorough glimpse of the life of Elizabeth Bowes-Lyon, Queen Elizabeth and Queen Mother. Interesting historic archive footage of Elizabeth and King George with President Franklin D. and First Lady Eleanor Roosevelt, christening Cunard's QE ship, and in the ruins of Buckingham Palace during WW2.
title: Century of Queen Mother - 100 Years in 100 Minutes: A Celebration
